channel.title: load balancer on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in load balancer on SoftLayer API

item.title: Order a Netscaler
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' client = SoftLayer::Client.new(:timeout => 120) config = { 'orderContainers' => [ {"hardware" => [{ "primaryBackendNetworkComponent" => { # REPLACE THIS "networkVlanId" => 1211234 }, "primaryNetworkComponent" => { # REPLACE THIS "networkVlanId" => 1212456 } }], # REPLACE THIS with your location "location" => "DALLAS09", "packageId" => 192, "quantity" => 1, # Price IDS for Netscaler and 2 IPs "prices" => [ {"id" => 44964}, {"id" => 17238} ] }] } order = client['Product_Order'].
